page.title: 08OUT FOR PLEASURE IN GARTMORE
page.content:
{The Black Bull Hotel}is about 200 years old and stands at one side of the Village Square. Its sign has a Black Bull on it. It has ten rooms and a dance hall. They serve Bar Meals and snacks. Their opening hours are 11.00am - 2.30pm and 5.30pm - 11.00pm. The proprietors are Mr and Mrs Roe.
{Ronnie's Restaurant}is situated near the River Forth. It is an attractive place with a wood-burning stove and bright lamps and table cloths. Mr and Mrs Johnston do all the cooking and serve a wide choice of dishes. There are 7 choices of starters, 3 fish dishes, 2 salads and 7 super sweet dishes. A 3 course meal would cost from Â£5 to Â£10.
